committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument and the Craters of the Moon National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: Idaho National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1995

summary.text: Idaho National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1995 - Amends the Arizona-Idaho Conservation Act of 1988 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands for inclusion within the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument. Revises the boundaries of Craters of the Moon National Monument, Idaho. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified land and interests in land within such revised boundaries. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Idaho National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1995
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument and the Craters of the Moon National Monument, and for other purposes.
